Task.Message: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Task.Name: TestTask

Task.Message: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Task.Name: ProcessCommandLine

Task.Message: Language Pack Setup LanguagePack related functionality
Task.Name: LanguagePack

Opcode.Message: Info
Opcode.Name: win:Info

Opcode.Message: Start
Opcode.Name: win:Start

Opcode.Message: Stop
Opcode.Name: win:Stop

Opcode.Message: Language Pack Setup initialization operation
Opcode.Name: Initialize

Opcode.Message: Language Pack Setup standard operation
Opcode.Name: Operation

Opcode.Message: Validate unattended parameters
Opcode.Name: ValidateParameters

Opcode.Message: Validate user's permission
Opcode.Name: ValidateUserPermission

Opcode.Message: Notify the system that a language has been installed or removed
Opcode.Name: CallNotifyUILanguageChange

Opcode.Message: Change the User UI language setting to selected language
Opcode.Name: ChangeUserUILanguage

Opcode.Message: Notify the system that the current User's User UI language setting has been changed by calling the NotifyUILanguage
Opcode.Name: CallNotifyUILanguageChangeUserUILanguage

Opcode.Message: Change the System UI language setting to selected language
Opcode.Name: ChangeSystemUILanguage

Opcode.Message: Notify the system that the system UI language setting has been changed by calling the NotifyUILanguage
Opcode.Name: CallNotifyUILanguageChangeSystemUILanguage

Opcode.Message: Log off the current user
Opcode.Name: Logoff

Opcode.Message: Validate specified path
Opcode.Name: ValidatePath

Opcode.Message: Retrieve language packs in specified path
Opcode.Name: GetLangPack

Opcode.Message: Validate that language pack can be installed
Opcode.Name: ValidateLangPackForInstall

Opcode.Message: Verify if the machine has sufficient disk space for the installation
Opcode.Name: VerifyDiskSpace

Opcode.Message: Pass control to CBS to install the language pack
Opcode.Name: CallCBSInstallLangPack

Opcode.Message: Validate that language pack can be removed
Opcode.Name: ValidateLangPackForRemoval

Opcode.Message: Pass control to CBS to remove the language pack
Opcode.Name: CallCBSRemoveLangPack

Opcode.Message: Initialize the LpkSetup wizard
Opcode.Name: InitWizard

Event.Message: CBS Client initialization failed. Last error: %1
CBS Client initialization failed. Last error: %1
Application initialization failed. Last error: %1
Failed to start language pack setup wizard. Please restart the system and try running the wizard again.

Event.Task: Language Pack Setup LanguagePack related functionality
Event.Message: The Language Pack for %1 has been disabled. Reason: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: CBS error %1 reported while operating on UI Language Pack for %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: CBS error %1 '%2' reported while operating on UI Language Pack for %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The command line argument %1 is not valid

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: The command line argument %1 is not valid. Please run lpksetup /? for help content.
The command line argument %1 is missing one or more required parameters

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: The command line argument %1 is missing one or more required parameters
Invalid language %1 specified as command line argument

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: The language name %1 is invalid, or does not correspond to a supported language. Please specify the language pack to install using a valid language name format, such as en-US, and ensure that the specifier corresponds to a supported language.
No languages found or invalid path: %1

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: Path %1 is invalid, not accessible, or does not include any language packs.

Event.Task: Language Pack Setup LanguagePack related functionality
Event.Message: The file %1 is not a valid Language Pack. Last error: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: The file %1 is not a valid Language Pack. The language pack might be corrupted. Last error: %2. Please download the language pack file again.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Could not find language %1. It's either not installed or not in the provided path.

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: Cannot find language pack for %1 in the provided path %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error message suppressed from UI: %1
This computer must be restarted before attempting to install or remove languages
Failed to start language pack setup wizard because the system is pending reboot. Please restart the system and try running lpksetup again.

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: The user does not have admin privilege. Please run this command using a user account with admin privilege.

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: The language pack for %1 cannot be installed because it is already installed.

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: The language pack for %1 is not applicable for this system. Please download the appropriate language pack that targets your system's architecture and SKU.

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: The language pack version for %1 does not match your current system. Please download the appropriate language pack that matches the version of your system.

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: The language pack for %1 cannot be installed because its parent language %2 is not installed. Please install the parent language pack before installing this language pack.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Verify if the machine has sufficient disk space for the installation
Event.Message: The disk space needed to install language pack %1 exceeds the available free disk space. Please free up some space before trying to install again.

Event.Opcode: Pass control to CBS to install the language pack
Event.Message: CBS failed to install the language pack for %1. Returned CBS error code %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be removed
Event.Message: Cannot uninstall language pack for %1 because it's not installed.

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be removed
Event.Message: You cannot uninstall language %1 because the language is the parent language of language %2. Please uninstall the dependent language first.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be removed
Event.Message: You cannot uninstall language %1 because the language is the system installed UI language.

Event.Opcode: Pass control to CBS to remove the language pack
Event.Message: CBS failed to remove the language pack for %1. Returned CBS error code %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Change the User UI language setting to selected language
Event.Message: Failed to change user UI language from %1 to %2. Please go to Regional and Language options control panel to change the user UI language.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Change the System UI language setting to selected language
Event.Message: Failed to change system UI language from %1 to %2. Please go to Regional and Language options control panel to change the system UI language.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Language Pack Setup LanguagePack related functionality
Event.Message: Install of UI Language Pack for %1 succeeded
Install of UI Language Pack for %1 succeeded

Event.Task: Language Pack Setup LanguagePack related functionality
Event.Message: Removal of UI Language Pack for %1 succeeded
Removal of UI Language Pack for %1 succeeded
The call to NotifyUILanguageChange for language %1 has failed with error %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Notify the system that a language has been installed or removed
Event.Message: The call to NotifyUILanguageChange for language %1 has failed with error %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The call to NotifyUILanguageChange to change Machine UI language from %1 to %2 failed with error %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Change the System UI language setting to selected language
Event.Message: The call to notify NotifyUILanguageChange that system UI language is changed from %1 to %2 failed with error %3. To manually evoke the callback, please use the Regional and Language options control panel to change the system UI language back to its original value and then change it to the desired value again.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to change Machine UI language from %1 to %2 failed with error %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: UI Language Pack cleanup operation completed successfully
UI Language Pack cleanup operation failed
Install of UI Language Pack for %1 failed
Removal of UI Language Pack for %1 failed

Event.Opcode: Pass control to CBS to install the language pack
Event.Message: CBS installed language pack for %1 successfully.

Event.Opcode: Pass control to CBS to remove the language pack
Event.Message: CBS removed language pack for %1 successfully.

Event.Opcode: Notify the system that a language has been installed or removed
Event.Message: The call to notify NotifyUILanguageChange that a new language %1 has been installed has failed with error %2. To manually evoke the callback, you have to uninstall the language pack and reinstall it again.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Change the User UI language setting to selected language
Event.Message: User UI language has been successfully changed from %1 to %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Change the System UI language setting to selected language
Event.Message: System UI language has been successfully changed from %1 to %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Language2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: LpkSetup wizard operation has failed with error: %1

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be installed
Event.Message: Validation for install of language %1 has failed with error: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Validate that language pack can be removed
Event.Message: Validation for removal of language %1 has failed with error: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Language" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: Starts processing lpksetup command line

Event.Task: Processing lpksetup unattended execution from the command line
Event.Message: Finish processing lpksetup command line
LPRemove launched.
LPRemove terminating.
Running in new boot (this is %1 th boot lpremove tries to run)
Run number %1 across the boot %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BootCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="CurrentSessionRunCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Resetting run-time data due to new boot
Maximum run attempt limit for a session (boot) reached. Next run will be attempted on after machine reboots.
Maximum run attempt limit for overall amoutn of machine boots reached. Lpremove won't run again. This is error situation meaning all prior runs have failed
LanguageCommitted value isn't set under System\CurrentControlSet\Control\MUI\UILanguages.(lpremove is terminating)
lpremove failed launching lpksetup failed
lpremove successfully launched lpksetup
LPRemove failed to obtain run data from registry. Unscheduling LpRemove.
LPRemove failed to incement run-data in registry. Unscheduling LpRemove.
LPRemove task failed to complete. Next scheduled run will try to complete the task.
LPRemove encountered internal error.
LPRemove failed to create a scheduled task for itself.
LPRemove executed in audit mode. No tasks were performed.

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The OnUILanguageAdd callback was called with new language %1, previous language %2 and flags %3. Return value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReturnValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The OnUILanguageRemove callback was called with new language %1, previous language %2 and flags %3. Return value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReturnValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The OnUILanguageClear callback was called with new language %1, previous language %2 and flags %3. Return value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReturnValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The OnMachineUILanguageInit callback was called with new language %1, previous language %2 and flags %3. Return value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReturnValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The OnMachineUILanguageSwitch callback was called with new language %1, previous language %2 and flags %3. Return value: %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NewLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PreviousLanguage" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ReturnValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Task: Task to test NotifyUILanguage callback dll.
Event.Message: The test callback API %1 failed with status %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="CallbackAPIName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
